data.subject: 搶答116
data.content:
116. 將後序式postfix轉前序式prefix，並詳述步驟。 a b + c * d e + f * + w z + *

[先將後序式轉成中序式，再轉成前序式]

Step1:(a b +) c * (d e +)  f  *   +   (w z +)   *

Step2: [(a+b)c *] [(d+e) f  *] + [(w+z)] *

Step3:{[(a+b)*c ] [(d+e)*f] +} [(w+z)*]

Step4:[(a+b)*c ]+[(d+e)*f] [(w+z) *]

Step5:[(a+b)*c ]+[(d+e)*f] * [(w+z)]

=>(((a+b)*c)+((d+e)*f)*(w+z)[中序式]

Step1:* ((a+b)*c)+((d+e)*f)(w+z)

Step2:* + ((a+b)*c) ((d+e)*f)(w+z)

Step3:* + * (a+b)c (d+e) * f (w+z)

Step4:* + * + a b c  * + d e f (w+z)

Step5:* + * + a b c  * + d e f  + w z

=>* + * + a b c  * + d e f  + w z
